Html:
I'm quite new to WPF but found a web source describing how to host a WinForm (even a VB) app inside a WPF TabItem.  I am now trying to do the same thing with a WPF window.  My app will create instances of a subclassed WPF Window and I wish to assign each instance to a separate TabItem in a WPF TabControl.  The Window classes and the Folder will reside in the same application.

Is this possible?
